content: please give me credit for the pattern please feel free to sell any completed items made from my designed pattern or donate any completed items to charity do not copy reproduce sell and/or distribute this pattern in any form this design and material are copyrighted and protected by federal copyright infringement knit cuddly critters designed by lorraine pistorio thank you for purchasing my cuddly critters pattern i hope you enjoy creating your own cuddly critter bunny ears make 2 7 k leaving long tail cast on 14 sts 8 k6 m1 k3 m1 k13 = 24 sts and join in-the-round 9 k round 1 k 10 k5 m1 k2 m1 k3 m1 k2 m1 k12 = 28 sts 2 k2 m1 k3 m1 k9 = 16 sts 11-28 k 3 k 29 k2 k2tog x 7 = 21 sts 4 k3 m1 k3 m1 k10 = 18 sts 30 k 5 k 31 k2tog k1 x 7 = 14 sts 6 k4 m1 k3 m1 k11 = 20 sts 32 k 7 k do not bind off cut yarn leaving long tail and thread yarn 8 k5 m1 k3 m1 k12 = 22 sts tail onto large-eyed blunt needle thread needle through 9 k loops of the 14 sts but do not pull up to gather yet stuff 10 k4 ssk k3 k2tog k11 = 20 sts the ear lightly with most of the stuffing at the end of the 11 k ear then pull up to gather and secure 12 k3 ssk k3 k2tog k10 = 18 sts 13 k 14 k2 ssk k3 k2tog k9 = 16 sts 15 k 16 k1 ssk k3 k2tog k8 = 14 sts 17 k 18 k2tog x 7 = 7 sts do not bind off cut yarn leaving long tail and thread yarn tail onto large-eyed blunt increases face the head with the stitch needle thread needle through increases at the base loops of the 7 sts then pull up of the ear facing on yarn tail to gather stitches the head stitch ears and secure to sides of head stuff the ear lightly fold ear at approx 1 ¾ apart the cast-on edge and 1 ¼ from eyes stitch to sides of head approx 1 apart and 2 from eyes bunny tail leaving long tail cast on 14 sts puppy ears make 2 and join in-the-round… you will be working from the base of the ear to the tip rounds 1-5 k leaving long tail cast on 14 sts 6 k2tog x 7 = 7 sts and join in-the-round do not bind off cut yarn leaving long tail and thread yarn round 1 k tail onto large-eyed blunt needle thread needle through 2 k2 m1 k3 m1 k9 = 16 sts loops of the 7 sts and pull up to gather stitches and 3 k secure stuff tail 4 k1 m1 k2 m1 k3 m1 k2 m1 k8 = 20 sts now at the cast-on edge…thread long tail onto large-
